attributes.action: Allow parents to register their newborn babies.
attributes.additional_details: My son was born in April and has still not had his birth registered as the local council is shut for all registrations except death registration. Whilst non-essential businesses are being allowed to open, a fundamental right, such as a birth registration, is still being denied to hundreds of parents.
attributes.background: The government needs to clarify when parents will be allowed to register the births of their child/ren. It is not right that non-essential businesses can reopen but yet birth registrations are prohibited.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

However, we have opened this petition which would achieve a similar goal, which you may wish to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315284.
